section:
Requirements To use &xist; you need the following software packages:
Python 2.1 (available from http://www.python.org/),
The Python &xml; package (available from http://pyxml.sourceforge.net/) (a newer version that includes sgmlop and expat, 0.6.2 will do),
the Python Imaging Library (available from http://www.pythonware.com/products/pil/)
and a C compiler supported by distutils

Installation To compile and install everything, simply perform the following steps:
Execute the command
python setup.py build
to copy *.py files and compile *.c files.
To install everything in the site-packages directory as an xist package, execute the command
python setup.py install
If you have difficulties installing this software, send a problem report to Walter Dörwald (walter@livinglogic.de) describing the problem.
